title: The Icarus Corps: The Darkside War; Titan's Fall; Jupiter Rising
description: An omnibus edition of the three Icarus Corps The Darkside War , Titan’s Fall , and the newest novel, Jupiter Rising , which details the sudden involvement in a galactic war between two opposing factions that want to use humanity as cannon fodder.Nebula and World Fantasy Award–nominated author Zachary Brown created a “good old-fashioned military science fiction” ( Locus ) in the Icarus Corps trilogy.The always outgunned and under-equipped human soldiers known as the Colonial Protection Forces battle across the moon and the alien desert landscapes of Titan all to make one desperate attack at Jupiter to hold the invading Conglomeration forces at bay, only to have a greater threat revealed as to why the Conglomeration–Accordance war has been raging across the galaxy.
author: Zachary Brown
